Entries.default:
"For what do you enter my home uninvited? This is my estate, not a beachside hut." 

Epero holds your gaze as she begins to draw her weapon.
"I'm here for the bounty on your head."

"You invite this information so freely - is it your first time?" 

Gritting her teeth, she advances.

"Ekera, and you got greedy. It will not happen again." 

She knits her brows and advances.

"The last mistake you'll ever make, I say." 

She advances on you quickly.

"Killing my dogs was your second mistake - and the one that will get you killed!" 

Epero wastes no time in picking up her weapon and charging at you.
